Title: IL Merger Tool
Description: IL Merger Tool is a GUI for the IL Merge. This tool allows you to merge different .net assemblies (dlls and exes) into one assembly with a wide range of options. This also enables you to save the settings and create post build actions for Visual Studio. Certified for Windows 7.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

IL Merger Tool provides an easy to use graphical user interface for the IL Merge developed by Microsoft Research.
This tool allows you to merge different .net assemblies (dlls and exes) into one assembly with a wide range of options.
This tool also enables you to save the settings and create post build actions for Visual Studio.
IL Merger Tool supports all .NET Framework versions including 4.0.
For more information, please check the documentation.

IL Merger Tool is fully compatible with Windows 7 and passed the Windows 7 Logo Test with 100%. To download the package which was tested by the Windows 7 Logo Toolkit, please go to the Downloads page and download the "LOGO Version".
